Meeting.text: Howdy, travler, I'm a witch you see.
I understand folks like you are constantly getting beat up.
I've got a cure for that.

Whether, you need the potion or not..
..either way I'll take 5 coins from you. hehe.

CheckIn.text: Welcome back! You got the coins?

NotEnoughMoney.text: Oh, not quite enough in your pocket.
